src:
FOTO: Rekap Hasil Liga Inggris Pekan Ke-11
04 Nov 2019, 07:08 by AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Chelsea meraih tiga poin pada laga tandang dengan mengalahkan Waford 2-1. Berikut foto-foto rekap hasil Liga Inggris pekan ke-11.


Manchester United kalah 0-1 dari Bournemouth di Stadion The Vitality, Bournemouth, Sabtu (2/11). (Mark Kerton/PA via AP)



Wolverhampton Wanderers tahan imbang Arsenal 1-1 berkat gol Raul Jimenez. (Paul Harding/PA via AP)



Liverpool mempermalukan Aston Villa 2-1 berkat dua gol Sadio Mane di Stadion Villa Park, Birmingham. (AP Photo/Rui Vieira)



Brighton and Hove Albion mengalahkan Norwich City 2-0. (Gareth Fuller/PA via AP)



Manchester City mengalahkan Southampton 2-1. Gol pembuka Man City dilesakkan oleh Sergio Aguero. (Martin Rickett/PA via AP)



Tuan rumah Sheffield United menang telak 3-0 atas Burnley. (Danny Lawson/PA via AP)



Newcastle United mengalahkan tuan rumah West Ham United 3-2. (Daniel Hambury/PA via AP)



Chelsea menaklukkan tuan rumah Watford 2-1 berkat gol Tammy Abraham dan Christian Pulisic. (John Walton/PA via AP)



Leicester City mengalahkan Crystal Palace 2-0. (John Walton/PA via AP)



Tottenham Hotspur menahan imbang tuan rumah Everton 1-1. (Nick Potts/PA via AP)
text:
PHOTO: Recap of Premier League Results Week 11
04 Nov 2019, 07:08 by AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Chelsea won three points in an away match by beating Waford 2-1. Here are photos of the recap of the results of the Premier League in the 11th week.


Manchester United lost 0-1 to Bournemouth at The Vitality Stadium, Bournemouth, Saturday (2/11). (Mark Kerton / PA via AP)



Wolverhampton Wanderers held Arsenal 1-1 with a goal from Raul Jimenez. (Paul Harding / PA via AP)



Liverpool humiliated Aston Villa 2-1 thanks to Sadio Mane's two goals at the Villa Park Stadium in Birmingham. (AP Photo / Rui Vieira)



Brighton and Hove Albion defeated Norwich City 2-0. (Gareth Fuller / PA via AP)



Manchester City beat Southampton 2-1. Man City's opening goal scored by Sergio Aguero. (Martin Rickett / PA via AP)



Host Sheffield United won a landslide 3-0 victory over Burnley. (Danny Lawson / PA via AP)



Newcastle United defeated host West Ham United 3-2. (Daniel Hambury / PA via AP)



Chelsea beat hosts Watford 2-1 thanks to goals from Tammy Abraham and Christian Pulisic. (John Walton / PA via AP)



Leicester City defeated Crystal Palace 2-0. (John Walton / PA via AP)



Tottenham Hotspur held host Everton 1-1. (Nick Potts / PA via AP)
